description:
`gomplate` is a template renderer which supports a [growing list of
datasources](https://docs.gomplate.ca/datasources/), such as:

- [JSON](https://www.json.org)
- [EJSON](https://github.com/Shopify/ejson) (encrypted JSON)
- [YAML](https://yaml.org/)
- [AWS EC2 metadata](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/ec2-instance-metadata.html)
- [BoltDB](https://github.com/boltdb/bolt)
- [Hashicorp Consul](https://www.consul.io/)
- [Hashicorp Vault secrets](https://www.hashicorp.com/products/vault/secrets-management)

**NB : For an [optimal experience](https://github.com/hairyhenderson/gomplate/issues/1095),
please use Gomplate on a proper terminal, and [Git Bash](https://community.chocolatey.org/packages/git)
 is the best option for that.
summary: gomplate is a template renderer which supports a growing list of datasources, such as JSON but not only.
author: Dave Henderson
